amendment.description: An amendment numbered 293 printed in Part A of House Report 119-199 to prohibit the expenditure of funds to create, procure, or display any map that depicts Taiwan as part of the territory of the People's Republic of China.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tiffany amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tiffany amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
